content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but I can suggest some popular restaurants in Ceuta based on online reviews. 

1. Restaurante Puerto Deportivo: This seafood restaurant is located in the marina and offers stunning views of the sea. They serve fresh fish and seafood dishes, along with rice and paella.

2. Restaurante Barbate: This traditional Spanish restaurant serves delicious tapas, meat, and fish dishes. They have an extensive wine list and offer a welcoming ambiance.

3. Restaurante Las Pergolas: This restaurant serves Mediterranean and Moroccan cuisine in a beautiful outdoor terrace with amazing views of Ceuta. They have a varied menu for meat, fish, and vegetarian dishes.

4. Restaurante La Almadraba: This restaurant offers a blend of Moroccan and Spanish cuisine with a focus on fresh seafood. They have a cozy outdoor terrace and a friendly atmosphere.

5. El Rancho Grill: This steak and barbecue restaurant is regarded as one of the best in Ceuta for meat lovers. They offer a wide variety of grilled meats, salads, and desserts.
